```{=html}
          <p style="font-size: 18px; font-style: italic; margin: 0; color: #C7D2FE; line-height: 1.6;">"Delegation develops dependency. You get output but not understanding.<br>Conversation makes you capable. You build understanding along with the output."</p>

        <table style="width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 16px 0;">
          <tr style="background: #3B1010;">

          </tr>
          <tr style="background: #1A3A2A;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; font-weight: bold; color: #4ADE80;">‚úì Conversation Mindset</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">"How do I use AI to think better <em>with</em> me?"</td>
          </tr>
        </table>

        <p><strong>What This Looks Like in Practice:</strong></p>
        <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px; margin: 16px 0;">
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Brainstorm</strong> with AI: explore possibilities together
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Iterate</strong> with AI: refine through back-and-forth
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Question</strong> AI's output: challenge assumptions
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Evaluate</strong> together: apply your judgement to AI's patterns

  function getDownloadBar(downloads) {
    if (!downloads) return '';
    const btnStyle = 'display: inline-block; padding: 6px 14px; border-radius: 6px; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Courier New", monospace;';
    let html = '<div style="display: flex; gap: 8px; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-top: 16px; padding-top: 12px; border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">';
    html += '<span style="font-size: 12px; color: #64748B; padding: 6px 0;">DOWNLOAD:</span>';
    if (downloads.html) html += `<a href="${downloads.html}" target="_blank" style="${btnStyle} background: #4F46E5; color: white;">HTML</a>`;
    if (downloads.docx) html += `<a href="${downloads.docx}" target="_blank" style="${btnStyle} background: #0EA5E9; color: white;">DOCX</a>`;
    if (downloads.pdf) html += `<a href="${downloads.pdf}" target="_blank" style="${btnStyle} background: #22C55E; color: white;">PDF</a>`;
    html += '</div>';
    return html;
  }

  function getComingSoonBadge() {
    return '<span style="background: #F59E0B; color: #1A1A2E; padding: 2px 10px; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 11px; font-weight: bold; font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; margin-left: 8px;">COMING SOON</span>';
  }

  function renderResources() {
    const container = document.getElementById('resources-container');
    const query = searchQuery.toLowerCase();

    const filtered = resources.filter(r => {
      const matchesCategory = currentCategory === 'all' || r.category === currentCategory;
      const matchesRole = currentRole === 'all' || r.roles.includes(currentRole);
      const matchesSearch = query === '' ||
        r.title.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
        r.summary.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
        r.content.toLowerCase().includes(query);

      return matchesCategory && matchesRole && matchesSearch;
    });

    document.getElementById('results-count').textContent = `${filtered.length} resource${filtered.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} found`;

    if (filtered.length === 0) {
      container.innerHTML = `
        <div style="text-align: center; padding: 48px; color: #64748B;">
          <div style="font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 16px;">üîç</div>
          <p>No resources match your filters. Try adjusting your search or filters.</p>
        </div>
      `;
      return;
    }

    container.innerHTML = filtered.map(r => {
      const comingSoon = r.comingSoon ? getComingSoonBadge() : '';
      const cardOpacity = r.comingSoon ? 'opacity: 0.7;' : '';
      const downloadBar = getDownloadBar(r.downloads);
      return `
      <div class="resource-card" data-id="${r.id}" style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px; overflow: hidden; ${cardOpacity}">
        <div class="resource-header" onclick="toggleResource('${r.id}')" style="padding: 20px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 16px;">
          <span style="font-size: 28px; flex-shrink: 0;">${r.emoji}</span>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 4px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #E2E8F0;">${r.title}</span>
              <span style="background: ${getCategoryColor(r.category)}; color: white; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 11px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; text-transform: uppercase;">${r.category}</span>
              ${comingSoon}
            </div>
            <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0; line-height: 1.5;">${r.summary}</p>
          </div>
          <span class="expand-icon" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.2s ease;">‚ñº</span>
        </div>
        <div class="resource-content" style="display: none; padding: 0 20px 20px 64px; border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">
          <div style="padding-top: 16px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; color: #CBD5E1;">
            ${r.content}
            ${downloadBar}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    `;
    }).join('');
  }

  function getCategoryColor(category) {
    const colors = {
      framework: '#4F46E5',
      technique: '#7C3AED',
      template: '#0EA5E9',
      guide: '#22C55E',
      reading: '#F59E0B',
      app: '#EC4899'
    };
    return colors[category] || '#64748B';
  }

  window.toggleResource = function(id) {
    const card = document.querySelector(`.resource-card[data-id="${id}"]`);
    const content = card.querySelector('.resource-content');
    const icon = card.querySelector('.expand-icon');

    if (content.style.display === 'none') {
      content.style.display = 'block';
      icon.style.transform = 'rotate(180deg)';
    } else {
      content.style.display = 'none';
      icon.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
    }
  };

  window.setCategory = function(category) {
    currentCategory = category;
    document.querySelectorAll('.category-btn').forEach(btn => {
      if (btn.dataset.category === category) {
        btn.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        btn.style.color = 'white';
      } else {
        btn.style.background = '#1E1E36';
        btn.style.color = '#64748B';
      }
    });
    renderResources();
  };

  window.setRole = function(role) {
    currentRole = role;
    document.querySelectorAll('.role-btn').forEach(btn => {
      if (btn.dataset.role === role) {
        btn.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        btn.style.color = 'white';
      } else {
        btn.style.background = '#1E1E36';
        btn.style.color = '#64748B';
      }
    });
    renderResources();
  };

  window.filterResources = function() {
    searchQuery = document.getElementById('search-input').value;
    renderResources();
  };

  // Initialize
  renderResources();
})();
</script>
```
